extendedInfo.description: This is a sample chapter of the story New Farm. To purchase the complete story for only .99 visit the Android Marketplace.A Nebraskan farm family's flight east to escape the effects of a supervolcano eruption in Yellowstone Park.The bright, fourteen-year-old daughter narrates their journey to Iowa, through volcanic ash and tragic occurrences. In Iowa, she makes a momentous decision. New Farm - A.
